body.description: To add a touch of richness to your current decor, the Princeton Coverlet Set can update your room in seconds. Made from polyester jacquard, the coverlet and shams share leaf, striping and medallion motifs that are accentuated by channel stitching on a chocolate brown base.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Madison Park Princeton King Size Quilt Bedding Set - Crimson Red, Jacquard Patterned Striped – 5 Piece Bedding Quilt Coverlets To add a touch of richness to your current décor, the Princeton 5 Piece Reversible Jacquard Coverlet Set can update your room in seconds. Made from polyester jacquard, the coverlet and shams share leaf, striping and medallion motifs that are accentuated by channel stitching on a chocolate brown base. Pops of red and ivory are also used throughout this collection adding a lavish feeling to your decor. Two decorative pillows feature pleating and embroidery details that correspond back to the coverlet to bring this entire look together. Material details: Coverlet: 100% poly jacquard, solid polyester brushed fabric back, 6oz cotton fill, all over quilted with self fabric binding, prewash finishSham: 100% cotton 6oz cotton fill quilted with tape, prewash finishPillow: 100% polyestercover, poly fill Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, and separately. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low, remove promptly. Do not iron. If there is no free movement in the washer or dryer, use large capacity commercial washer/dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This BEAUTIFUL Quilt gets 10 Stars 🌟
reviews.reviewText: Once in a while you get pleasantly surprised by an on-line purchase that looks WAY better than the photo ~ This one has the “WOW” factor !!It looks classy without being overstated.. the combination of fabric designs really complement each other well.. the stitching is sturdy and immaculate.. the texture is smooth and comfortable.. LOVE the espresso brown backing (not faded out chalky brown).. some queen size quilts barely cover the mattress, this one is PERFECT... not too heavy, not too light, it’s just right.. It lays very nicely (even while sleeping) and doesn’t end up on the floor like some super lightweight quilts.. I didn’t really need the pillows but they are a nice accent nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty and good quality
reviews.reviewText: We wanted something that was easy to wash, pretty to look at, and light, but warm. Plus, wanted something with a pattern that was easy on the eyes, and came with small pillows. This is our favorite comforter set. There are small patterns of glitter/shimmer, which appeals to me, and my husband likes the grey/white/merlot pattern. Purchased a bedskirt and two other pillows from other seller to complete the look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of the price at first since there are other big box stores who sell the Madison Park brand for much much more. I received it in a timely manner and I was very pleased with the quality of the material and the stitching. The quilt is light weight and well-made. I bought the king size and it fits well with approx 10 inches overhang on each side and at the foot. The pillow shams are also well-made. The colors of the material are beautiful! The decorative pillows came vacuum sealed and I have not opened them yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and light weight
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the money. Feels and looks good in quality, but is not lux. The colors and prints were on point with the product images online. Hated the larger brown accent pillow (cheap, small, and no fluff) so we’re still looking for the right fit and used one from our old set temporarily. Generally very happy to find something to tie the grey and chocolate color mix of our bedroom furniture, paint, and curtains together, but it might be a bit feminine/busy pattern for the straight line and masculine feel of the rest of the room. My negatives are mainly whether it’s the right fit for our style. No complaints about the product itself, except the chocolate accent pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, soft and just right!
reviews.reviewText: We decided to do something new with the bedrooms and I wanted a different set for the master bedroom. I found this set on Amazon. It came quickly, and in time for Thanksgiving. I love the look. It looks more expensive than what we paid. The comforter isn't too heavy, which is fine because we live in the south. We can always add a quilt or down comforter when it gets cold. To be honest, we previously ordered a set from this grouping, and it was terrible! Cheap looking, hard fabric and had "sequins" on the pillow! I took a chance and I'm happy with how it looks and feels. The comforter and pillows were a bit wrinkled, but we steamed them, and it looks fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quilt, great quality
reviews.reviewText: This is the second Madison Park quilt I have purchased for a king sized bed this month. The first was the Lucy quilt for a guest bed. I was so impressed that I decided to search for one for my room. The fabric is thick and held up great in a washer with an agitator. It isn’t super soft like some quilts, but I am not sleeping with it so that wasn’t part of my decision process. It came packaged well, taped fully around all edges of the box. Inside the quilt was in a thick plastic bag like quilts for sale in retail stores. Each of the throw pillows were vacuum sealed. I tossed them in the dryer with a dryer ball for an hour and they were fluffy and good to go. I have espresso bedroom furniture with silver knobs that doesn’t really go with the modern neutral farmhouse theme of the rest of my home. This quilt helped bring it all together. I love that it goes with taupe, gray, brown, cream, and white. I only used one of the included throw pillows. This is a great buy for the quality. I purchased a quilt from Levtex and although it was softer, I was not impressed with the dye quality or fabric quality. This one was far superior.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is warm. Lays on bed perfectly. Fits well. Attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Other reviews didn’t rate favorably but I decided to take a chance. So glad I did. Looks and feels great. The pillows are a bit slender but works fine for what I need.
Awesome product, matched our bedroom perfectly.
Makes the room look like a fancy motel

reviews.reviewTitle: I have king bed I ordered kal king still a bit shots on sides

reviews.reviewText: MÁS BONITA Y DE CALIDAD DE LO QUE APARECE EN LA FOTO
